channel.title: Help: Public / renaming!
channel.description:
Okay so i downloaded my source (devolution 7.0) i have got everything working run server compliler made new places such as training places skill places etc. Made new commands such as ::pure (all stats maxed) And this is the farthest i have gotten into making a rs private server i have downloaded no-ip made my host but how do i hook it up into making it public WITHOUT HAMICHI! Please HELP! Also the source is totally coded except at the top it says ex. Devolution v2 (1 online) And When you log in it says "Welcoem to devolution v2" HOW DO I CHNAGE THESE!?!?! One last thing! Since i am the owner i ahould be able to see everyones pass incass they have admin armour or something they shouldnt i can go on and delete it from them. Well guess what? devolution has the passes encrypted how do i uncrypt these????? :confused:
PLEASE HELP! AND A HEFTY REWARD WiLL FOLLOW FOR ANYONE WHO ANSWERS (AND IT HELPS ME) A QUESTION! Rewards: Admin on my server (or possibly co-owner) A can make a BA website from smfforfree.com for you A youtube video with awsome editing done by me and posted upon youtube If you play WoW i can give you gold Answer all these questions and you can possibly get all these!
~Thanks for your time~

item.title: Help: Public / renaming!
item.dc:creator: @Bladex0x Bladex0x
item.description:
@Bladex0x wrote:

Well, this is the wrong section but i can help you with some stuff i do not want anything in return because i do not like/play rs2 servers…

to change the log in how it says “Welcome to devolution v2” go to Client.java cntrl f and find Welcome to devolution v2, Change it to whatever you want Such as Welcome to Examplescape!

If see a npc yelling something like Welcome to devoultion v2! go to npchandler and search that and change to whatever u want

Hope i helped…

Read full topic

item.title: Help: Public / renaming!
item.dc:creator: @geeno geeno
item.description:
@geeno wrote:

Okay so i downloaded my source (devolution 7.0) i have got everything working run server compliler made new places such as training places skill places etc. Made new commands such as ::pure (all stats maxed) And this is the farthest i have gotten into making a rs private server i have downloaded no-ip made my host but how do i hook it up into making it public WITHOUT HAMICHI! Please HELP! Also the source is totally coded except at the top it says ex. Devolution v2 (1 online) And When you log in it says “Welcoem to devolution v2” HOW DO I CHNAGE THESE!!! One last thing! Since i am the owner i ahould be able to see everyones pass incass they have admin armour or something they shouldnt i can go on and delete it from them. Well guess what? devolution has the passes encrypted how do i uncrypt these???

PLEASE HELP! AND A HEFTY REWARD WiLL FOLLOW FOR ANYONE WHO ANSWERS (AND IT HELPS ME) A QUESTION!
Rewards:
Admin on my server (or possibly co-owner)
A can make a BA website from smfforfree.com for you
A youtube video with awsome editing done by me and posted upon youtube
If you play WoW i can give you gold
Answer all these questions and you can possibly get all these!
